metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15531 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
GNU Libextractor through 1.9 has a heap-based buffer over-read in the function EXTRACTOR_dvi_extract_method in plugins/dvi_extractor.c. It was discovered that Libextractor incorrectly handled certain files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15531` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

extract - 1:1.3-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
libextractor3 - 1:1.3-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libextractor package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.3-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
